metadata.title: CVE-2019-14816 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
There is heap-based buffer overflow in kernel, all versions up to,excluding 5.3, in the marvell wifi chip driver in Linux kernel, that allowslocal users to cause a denial of service(system crash) or possibly executearbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-66-generic - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-4.15.0-66-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-4.15.0-66-lowlatency - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-66-generic - 4.15.0-66.75
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-66-lowlatency - 4.15.0-66.75
No subscription required

linux-image-5.0.0-32-generic - 5.0.0-32.34~18.04.2
linux-image-5.0.0-32-generic-lpae - 5.0.0-32.34~18.04.2
